methods.name: create
methods.summary: Check in to a place or event.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Checkins: Checkin to a Place or Event for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the checkins property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
